overview: "'Perfect Slaves #8' contains one of the most incredible scenes I have ever shot, with Norma Jane, who we met the day before the shooting in a restaurant with her boyfriend. Next day at 7:00 in the morning she was at the lab to get tested. I cannot believe she told us that she wanted to see how a porn movie is made, and she just wanted to see it and maybe participate. It was incredible because she got fucked by almost everybody in the room and we could not edit all her scenes. All the boys went crazy with her wearing a mask, so probably nobody will recognize her, but I do have a lot of doubt about this. 'Perfect Slaves' is still my best line I am definitely sure."  - Rocco Siffredi
title: Rocco's Perfect Slaves 8
